name: Jumpin' Jalopies
overview: Welcome to Jumpin' Jalopies for the Commodore 64! This game was originally made for the Reset 4k craptastic game coding competition. This version includes loading music, loading picture, Petscii Instructions, a Megastyle intro and a bug fixed version of the game. Everything linked together into one file,. The city's parking garage is almost full, and the only available parking spot is located on the top floor. Use your Jalopy's hydraulics and jump between all the floors in the parking garage. This must be done without crashing with the other vehicles in the garage. Can you can reach the only available parking spot before the other drivers take it!?? You may have to go all the way to level 999 to find the open spot!
